Author: Machgielis#2406
Content: Hi All. We want to start with a big thank you for believing in us early. Its been an amazing few weeks. We have been in contact with 3 of the top 10 exchanges relating to listing and we have an agreement already in place. However, this isnt a cheap process by any means, so we are determining how to raise the funds over the next 48 hours. This is testament that others see the value this project can bring and we have begun discussions with a number of other industry partners too. Please stay tuned for further updates.

Content: `so we are determining how to raise the funds over the next 48 hours`

Author: Machgielis#2406
Content: There isnt enough liquidity in the coin yet.  There will be a partial payment in treasury coins from the founders fee but there is a substantial BTC requirement too. This is what we are working on now.

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
`I don’t know about the stratum protocol.`
It's not really the "protocol" that needs changed, but since nomp and all forks of it incorporate a transaction library into the stratum module, all such forks did/do need a stratum *module* update

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
afaik, jokers "shouldn't" need any major update because of his work-around in how it creates blocks
as for putting it into s-nomp (rather than his implementation of z-nomp), I think that's a non-starter because of the reworking of payouts due to that same workaround
Am I wrong @blackjok3r ?

Author: Laviathon -bcmonster.com#0462
Content: @ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢   I think we would need to set the config file like zen for example and it should in theory work....   for example.....   https://github.com/s-nomp/s-nomp/blob/master/coins/zen.json

Author: Laviathon -bcmonster.com#0462
Content: I think it would do away with the mods he has implemented bypassing the Coinbase.

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: @Laviathon -bcmonster.com for joker's version it's far more than just config (his has the ability to take pool % from the coinbase tx removed)

Author: Laviathon -bcmonster.com#0462
Content: Yea it just stops him from breaking the block on discovery.

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: it needs a new payment system to store and account for the difference

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: which also involves redis db changes

Author: Laviathon -bcmonster.com#0462
Content: @ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢 I’m talking about making it an s-nomp coin.

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
oh, I thought that your comment tagging me was in reference to my comment immediately above it
-----
I'm not sure about the "official" s-nomp, but I know that miketout's fork of it does work and the only config change off the top of my head is setting sapling height

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
--------
My earlier comment about s-nomp was in relation to merging joker's cb format with s-nomp and that's where my head was at in the responses

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: joker's format of implementing a usage of the daemon blocktemplate is because there isn't currently a transaction library that supports many of the assetchain features available and his is the current best public method for supporting the most assetchains in total

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢 I believe joker has pool fee working with his implementation

Author: Alright#0419
Content: just in a very different way than typical nomp payment processing

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: I thought he said he had, but my point was that afaik he used z-nomp as the base, which would create a ton of work to port into s-nomp

Author: Alright#0419
Content: really just boils down to whether or not we support s-nomp or knomp

Author: Alright#0419
Content: or both?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: not sure s-nomp would accept the changes

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: well, it's no secret that my answer is "neither" 😛

Author: Alright#0419
Content: it's backwards compatible, but is a drastic change from typical stratum

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢 and what do you suggest?

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
the same as I've said for a yr now:
"we need to start from the ground up and make a Komodo product for Komodo"

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: since I'm alone in that voice, it's at least 6 months out
